snippet.title: Spring 2009 Dean's List Students (from Springfield) Springfield residents who have been named to the Dean's List for the Spring 2009 semester at Springfield Technical Community College have been announced by Vice President for Academic Affairs Stephen H. Keller. The Dean's List is published each semester to recognize above-average academic performance. Students carrying a full-time course load of 12 or more semester hours of college-level courses, who achieve a quality point average of 3.3 or above, are placed on the Dean's List. Students honored on the list include Idairis Acevedo-Pagan
snippet.description:
